name: Footy Golf
description:
Footy Golf is a wacky arcade game that combines STREET SOCCER with GOLF.

Using your foot instead of a club, AIM and FREE KICK the ball through playful courses filled with lamp posts, trash cans, bouncy springs, fences and more.
Complete each course by netting the ball in as few shots as possible!

Bonus items such as COINS and hidden DIAMONDS can be collected and used to unlock new characters and additional balls.
Can you unlock them all?

* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *

GAME FEATURES:

- 160 Courses divided into 8 themes
- Over 60 unique characters to collect
- Unlockable balls with different characteristics
- Varying themes: Suburbs, Cave, Factory, Desert, Winter, Space
- Game Center support

* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *

- Promoted "New Games We Love" by Apple, Apr 2017
- #1 HOT GAME - Touch Arcade, Apr 2017
- "Top 10 Mobile Games" - Mobile Startupz

Enjoy another Donut Games release!
